heading: cell sale
subheading: the site of northern ireland's infamous maze prison may soon be converted from cellblocks to a labyrinth of worker cubicles. the belfast penitentiary, which for decades housed ira prisoners including hunger striker bobby sands, will close at year's end as part of the belfast peace agreement. the real estate may be turned into an industrial park, which could attract some of the technology companies who are opening facilities on the emerald isle.
author: wired staff
text: the site of northern ireland's infamous maze prison may soon be converted from cellblocks to a labyrinth of worker cubicles. the belfast penitentiary, which for decades housed ira prisoners including hunger striker bobby sands, will close at year's end as part of the belfast peace agreement. the real estate may be turned into an industrial park, which could attract some of the technology companies who are opening facilities on the emerald isle.
